description: [``botocore``] AWS SageMaker - Releasing new APIs related to Callback steps in model building pipelines. Adds experiment integration to model building pipelines.
[``botocore``] Add SampleSize variable to S3Target to enable s3-sampling feature through API.
[``botocore``] Update regex validation in kmsKeyArn and s3 path API parameters for AWS Personalize APIs
[``botocore``] Added updateConfig option that allows customers to control upgrade velocity in Managed Node Group.
